Break Reminder Privacy Policy

Effective Date: Jan 7, 2024

Thank you for choosing Break Reminder! This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you use our Chrome app. By installing and using Break Reminder, you agree to the terms and practices described in this policy.

1. Information We Collect:

1.1 User-Provided Information:

When you create an account or use Break Reminder, we may collect personal information such as your name, email address, and any other details you voluntarily provide.
1.2 Task Progress:

Break Reminder now includes a feature that allows users to save completed tasks. This information is securely stored in our database associated with your account.
2. How We Use Your Information:

2.1 Task Progress:

We utilize the saved task progress feature to ensure continuity for users. Your completed tasks are securely stored in our database to provide you with a seamless experience when you log in again.
2.2 Communication:

We may use your provided email address to communicate important updates, information about the app, or respond to inquiries.
3. Data Security:

3.1 Encryption:

Your personal information and task progress are encrypted using industry-standard security measures to protect against unauthorized access.
3.2 Access Controls:

Access to your personal information and task progress is restricted to authorized personnel only.
4. Sharing Your Information:

4.1 Third-Party Services:

We do not share your personal information or task progress with third-party services. Your data is stored securely on our servers.
5. Your Choices:

5.1 Account Information:

You can review and update your account information by logging into Break Reminder.
5.2 Unsubscribe:

You can opt-out of receiving non-essential communications by unsubscribing from our email notifications.
6. Changes to Privacy Policy:

6.1 Updates:

We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in our practices. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.
7. Contact Us:

7.1 Questions:

If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at gautamsharma2813@gmail.com

By using Break Reminder, you acknowledge that you have read and agree to this Privacy Policy.
